path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Summer 24/Basic Nursing Skills/Documents/Module V Objectives.pdf
text: TEMPLECOLLEGE VOCATIONAL NURSING PROGRAM BASIC NURSING SKILLS: VNSG 1423 MODULE V – Nutrition, Documentation, Patient Education, Admitting, Transferring & Discharging Chapters 7, 9, 23, 26, 27 (pgs. 492-494 & p. 501) - Williams After completing this module, the student will be able to: 1. Discuss and apply the principles of documentation. 2. Discuss maintaining confidentiality and privacy of medical records. 3. Utilize the nursing process to implement a teaching-learning plan. 4. Identify methods to overcome barriers associated with teaching & learning. 5. Summarize the nurse’s role in Admitting, Transferring, and Discharging patients in various settings. 6. Discuss the function and Identify food sources of proteins, carbohydrates, fats, vitamins, and minerals. 7. Explore factors and cultural practices that influence nutrition. 8. Identify different dietary modifications and special diets. 9. Explain how to assist a patient with feeding.
